heading: Tuesday Night
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of showers west of the Greens late, a rising chance along and east of the Greens. Lows from the mid 40s to around 50, with some lower 40s northeast and in the Adirondacks. South winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy, with rain likely early, mainly along and east of the Greens; otherwise scattered to numerous showers and possibly a thunderstorm, tapering off south in the afternoon. Highs in the upper 50s to lower 60s south and in the broad northwestern valleys, mid to upper 50s elsewhere north. Southeast winds 5 to 10 mph, becoming south.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Showers tapering off, except lingering in the Adirondacks, with some summit-level snow showers possible there; otherwise partial clearing, mainly southeast. Lows from the upper 30s to mid 40s. South winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley.
